show.title: The Intruder
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://applinks.kukufm.com/uQwXHqZ6YMTJ2trt6
show.description: A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.
show.description_secondary: A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.
